page.title: 20Children's Games.
page.content: The games we normally play are bulldog,spot & skittles.In {bulldog you have{3}or more players.This is what happens.One person walks away & chooses some names,then the person who is tagged chooses a name & that named person runs.If he is caught he is on the 'it'side.If he gets to the opposite side the rest run there. {Spot}is where you get a football and kick it against a circle on a wall you score points every time it hits in the middle of the circle. { Skittles}is where you have about{3} players.One uses the ball & the others go on the wall & if it hits a person below the neck they are 'it'.
